The time in town X on longitude 15°E is 4.00 pm. What will be the time in town Y on longitude 15°W
questions.correction:
Longitude 15° East Longitude 15° West.
Town X Town Y
4:00pm. ?
1°=4 minutes
15°=1 hours
15°E+15°W=30° 15°=1hr
30°=?
30°*1hr/15° =2hrs

Since we are looking for the time in town Y, we subtract
4:00pm-2hrs= 2:00pm
